Package com.example.untoldpsproject.services

Class CartItemService

java.lang.Object
com.example.untoldpsproject.services.CartItemService
@Service public class CartItemService extends Object
This service class provides methods to manage cart items in the system.

      Returns:

    • findCartItemById

      public CartItem findCartItemById(String id)
      Finds a cart item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the cart item to find.
      Returns:
      The found cart item, or null if not found.

    • update

      public void update(CartItem cartItem)
      Updates an existing cart item.
      Parameters:
      cartItem - The cart item with updated information.

    • findCartItemsByCartId

      public List<CartItem> findCartItemsByCartId(String cartId)
      Finds all cart items belonging to a particular cart.
      Parameters:
      cartId - The ID of the cart to find cart items for.
      Returns:
      A list of cart items belonging to the specified cart.

    • findCartItemByTicketIdAndCartId

      public CartItem findCartItemByTicketIdAndCartId(String ticketId, String cartId)
      Finds a cart item by its ticket ID and cart ID.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The ID of the ticket.
      cartId - The ID of the cart.
      Returns:
      The found cart item, or null if not found.

    • deleteCartItemById

      public void deleteCartItemById(String cartItemId)
      Deletes a cart item by its ID. If the quantity of the cart item is greater than 1, it decreases the quantity by 1; otherwise, it deletes the cart item entirely.
      Parameters:
      cartItemId - The ID of the cart item to delete.
